page.title: 13FUNDRAISING BED-PUSH
page.content:
Anyone who noticed ten odd-looking nurses doing their rounds in several Clydebank pubs recently pushing even odder looking patients around in beds can set their minds at rest.
It was simply Clydebank Area Youth Council with yet another of their fun fund-raising ideas.
Over the last few weeks the young people have collected Â£562 which will be shared between St. Margaret's Hospice, Hardgate Hospital and the Clydebank Youth Fund. Final totals were,Goldenhill-Â£15.34 Duntiglennan-Â£14.95 Glenhead-Â£11.32 Cameron House-Â£10.01 Pinetrees-Â£3.20
